The process is extremely simple, quick and completely paperless. Invest in a few minutes with the following steps: Log on to your Groww account Search for HDFC Mid Cap Fund Direct Growth from the search box In order to invest, you will have to complete all the KYC formalities which are completely online and paperless and take a few minutes to complete Once you are done with that, you can start investing in HDFC Mid Cap Fund Direct Growth as SIP or lumpsum as per your investment objective and risk tolerance What kind of returns does HDFC Mid Cap Fund Direct Growth provide?The HDFC Mid Cap Fund Direct Growth has been there from 01 Jan 2013 and the average annual returns provided by this fund is 12.50% since its inception.How much expense ratio is charged by HDFC Mid Cap Fund Direct Growth?The term Expense Ratio used for HDFC Mid Cap Fund Direct Growth or any other mutual fund is the annual charges one needs to pay to the Mutual Fund company for managing your investments in that fund. The Expense Ratio of HDFC Mid Cap Fund Direct Growth is 0.71% as of 18 Nov 2025...What is the AUM of HDFC Mid Cap Fund Direct Growth?The AUM, short for Assets Under Management of HDFC Mid Cap Fund Direct Growth is ₹89,383.23Cr as of 18 Nov 2025.How to Redeem HDFC Mid Cap Fund Direct Growth?If you want to sell your HDFC Mid Cap Fund Direct Growth holdings, go to your holding on the app or web and simply click on it. Invest in a few minutes with the following steps: Log on to your Groww account Search for HDFC Mid Cap Fund Direct Growth from the search box In order to invest, you will have to complete all the KYC formalities which are completely online and paperless and take a few minutes to complete Once you are done with that, you can start investing in HDFC Mid Cap Fund Direct Growth as SIP or lumpsum as per your investment objective and risk tolerance What kind of returns does HDFC Mid Cap Fund Direct Growth provide?The HDFC Mid Cap Fund Direct Growth has been there from 01 Jan 2013 and the average annual returns provided by this fund is 12.50% since its inception.How much expense ratio is charged by HDFC Mid Cap Fund Direct Growth?The term Expense Ratio used for HDFC Mid Cap Fund Direct Growth or any other mutual fund is the annual charges one needs to pay to the Mutual Fund company for managing your investments in that fund. The Expense Ratio of HDFC Mid Cap Fund Direct Growth is 0.71% as of 18 Nov 2025...What is the AUM of HDFC Mid Cap Fund Direct Growth?The AUM, short for Assets Under Management of HDFC Mid Cap Fund Direct Growth is ₹89,383.23Cr as of 18 Nov 2025.How to Redeem HDFC Mid Cap Fund Direct Growth?If you want to sell your HDFC Mid Cap Fund Direct Growth holdings, go to your holding on the app or web and simply click on it. You will get two options - redeem & invest more; click on redeem and enter your desired amount or if you wish to redeem the entire holding amount then select the 'redeem all' checkbox. Can I invest in SIP and Lump Sum of HDFC Mid Cap Fund Direct Growth?You can select either SIP or Lumpsum investment of HDFC Mid Cap Fund Direct Growth based on your investment objective and risk tolerance.What is the NAV of HDFC Mid Cap Fund Direct Growth?The NAV of HDFC Mid Cap Fund Direct Growth is ₹226.08 as of 17 Nov 2025.What is the PE and PB ratio of HDFC Mid Cap Fund Direct Growth?The PE ratio ratio of HDFC Mid Cap Fund Direct Growth is determined by dividing the market price by its earnings per share and the PB ratio of the same is evaluated by dividing the stock price per share by its book value per share (BVPS).Looking to invest in mutual funds?Explore diversified funds designed for every investorInvest NowHome>Mutual Funds>HDFC Mutual Fund>HDFC Mid Cap Fund Direct GrowthVaishnavi Tech Park, South Tower, 3rd FloorSarjapur Main Road, Bellandur, Bengaluru – 560103KarnatakaContact UsDownload the AppGROWWAbout UsPricingBlogMedia & PressCareersHelp & SupportTrust & SafetyInvestor RelationsPRODUCTSStocksF&OMTFETFIPOMutual FundsCommoditiesGroww Terminal915 TerminalStocks ScreenerAlgo TradingGroww DigestDemat AccountGroww AMC© 2016-2025 Groww. - **Exit Load**: Understand termsExpense ratioA fee payable to a mutual fund house for managing your mutual fund investments. It is the total percentage of a company’s fund assets used for administrative, management, advertising, and other expenses.TaxA percentage of your capital gains payable to the government upon exiting your mutual fund investments. Taxation is categorized as long-term capital gains (LTCG) and short-term capital gains (STCG) depending on your holding period and the type of fund.Exit loadA fee payable to a mutual fund house for exiting a fund (fully or partially) before the completion of a specified period from the date of investment.Stamp dutyA form of tax payable for the purchase or sale of an asset or security. The process is extremely simple, quick and completely paperless. Invest in a few minutes with the following steps: Log on to your Groww account Search for HDFC Large Cap Fund Direct Growth from the search box In order to invest, you will have to complete all the KYC formalities which are completely online and paperless and take a few minutes to complete Once you are done with that, you can start investing in HDFC Large Cap Fund Direct Growth as SIP or lumpsum as per your investment objective and risk tolerance What kind of returns does HDFC Large Cap Fund Direct Growth provide?The HDFC Large Cap Fund Direct Growth has been there from 01 Jan 2013 and the average annual returns provided by this fund is 8.20% since its inception.How much expense ratio is charged by HDFC Large Cap Fund Direct Growth?The term Expense Ratio used for HDFC Large Cap Fund Direct Growth or any other mutual fund is the annual charges one needs to pay to the Mutual Fund company for managing your investments in that fund. The Expense Ratio of HDFC Large Cap Fund Direct Growth is 0.97% as of 18 Nov 2025...What is the AUM of HDFC Large Cap Fund Direct Growth?The AUM, short for Assets Under Management of HDFC Large Cap Fund Direct Growth is ₹39,779.26Cr as of 18 Nov 2025.How to Redeem HDFC Large Cap Fund Direct Growth?If you want to sell your HDFC Large Cap Fund Direct Growth holdings, go to your holding on the app or web and simply click on it. - **Exit Load**: Understand termsExpense ratioA fee payable to a mutual fund house for managing your mutual fund investments. It is the total percentage of a company’s fund assets used for administrative, management, advertising, and other expenses.TaxA percentage of your capital gains payable to the government upon exiting your mutual fund investments. Taxation is categorized as long-term capital gains (LTCG) and short-term capital gains (STCG) depending on your holding period and the type of fund.Exit loadA fee payable to a mutual fund house for exiting a fund (fully or partially) before the completion of a specified period from the date of investment.Stamp dutyA form of tax payable for the purchase or sale of an asset or security. content_md:
## FAQ

**Q: Tax implication**

If you redeem within one year, returns are taxed at 20%. If you redeem after one year, returns exceeding Rs 1.25 lakh in a financial year are taxed at 12.5%.

## FAQ

**Q: How to Invest in HDFC Large Cap Fund Direct Growth?You can easily invest in HDFC Large Cap Fund Direct Growth in a hassle-free manner on Groww. The process is extremely simple, quick and completely paperless. Invest in a few minutes with the following steps: Log on to your Groww account Search for HDFC Large Cap Fund Direct Growth from the search box In order to invest, you will have to complete all the KYC formalities which are completely online and paperless and take a few minutes to complete Once you are done with that, you can start investing in HDFC Large Cap Fund Direct Growth as SIP or lumpsum as per your investment objective and risk tolerance**

What kind of returns does HDFC Large Cap Fund Direct Growth provide?The HDFC Large Cap Fund Direct Growth has been there from 01 Jan 2013 and the average annual returns provided by this fund is 8.20% since its inception.

The process is extremely simple, quick and completely paperless. Invest in a few minutes with the following steps: Log on to your Groww account Search for HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth from the search box In order to invest, you will have to complete all the KYC formalities which are completely online and paperless and take a few minutes to complete Once you are done with that, you can start investing in HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth as SIP or lumpsum as per your investment objective and risk tolerance What kind of returns does HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth provide?The HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth has been there from 01 Jan 2013 and the average annual returns provided by this fund is 7.08% since its inception.How much expense ratio is charged by HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth?The term Expense Ratio used for HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth or any other mutual fund is the annual charges one needs to pay to the Mutual Fund company for managing your investments in that fund. The process is extremely simple, quick and completely paperless. Invest in a few minutes with the following steps: Log on to your Groww account Search for HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth from the search box In order to invest, you will have to complete all the KYC formalities which are completely online and paperless and take a few minutes to complete Once you are done with that, you can start investing in HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth as SIP or lumpsum as per your investment objective and risk tolerance What kind of returns does HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth provide?The HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth has been there from 01 Jan 2013 and the average annual returns provided by this fund is 7.08% since its inception.How much expense ratio is charged by HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth?The term Expense Ratio used for HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth or any other mutual fund is the annual charges one needs to pay to the Mutual Fund company for managing your investments in that fund. The Expense Ratio of HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth is 0.67% as of 18 Nov 2025...What is the AUM of HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth?The AUM, short for Assets Under Management of HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth is ₹38,412.10Cr as of 18 Nov 2025.How to Redeem HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth?If you want to sell your HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth holdings, go to your holding on the app or web and simply click on it. The process is extremely simple, quick and completely paperless. Invest in a few minutes with the following steps: Log on to your Groww account Search for HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth from the search box In order to invest, you will have to complete all the KYC formalities which are completely online and paperless and take a few minutes to complete Once you are done with that, you can start investing in HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth as SIP or lumpsum as per your investment objective and risk tolerance What kind of returns does HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth provide?The HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth has been there from 01 Jan 2013 and the average annual returns provided by this fund is 7.08% since its inception.How much expense ratio is charged by HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth?The term Expense Ratio used for HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth or any other mutual fund is the annual charges one needs to pay to the Mutual Fund company for managing your investments in that fund. The Expense Ratio of HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth is 0.67% as of 18 Nov 2025...What is the AUM of HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth?The AUM, short for Assets Under Management of HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth is ₹38,412.10Cr as of 18 Nov 2025.How to Redeem HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth?If you want to sell your HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth holdings, go to your holding on the app or web and simply click on it. You will get two options - redeem & invest more; click on redeem and enter your desired amount or if you wish to redeem the entire holding amount then select the 'redeem all' checkbox. Can I invest in SIP and Lump Sum of HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth?You can select either SIP or Lumpsum investment of HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth based on your investment objective and risk tolerance.What is the NAV of HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth?The NAV of HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth is ₹163.11 as of 17 Nov 2025.What is the PE and PB ratio of HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth?The PE ratio ratio of HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth is determined by dividing the market price by its earnings per share and the PB ratio of the same is evaluated by dividing the stock price per share by its book value per share (BVPS).Looking to invest in mutual funds?Explore diversified funds designed for every investorInvest NowHome>Mutual Funds>HDFC Mutual Fund>HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct GrowthVaishnavi Tech Park, South Tower, 3rd FloorSarjapur Main Road, Bellandur, Bengaluru – 560103KarnatakaContact UsDownload the AppGROWWAbout UsPricingBlogMedia & PressCareersHelp & SupportTrust & SafetyInvestor RelationsPRODUCTSStocksF&OMTFETFIPOMutual FundsCommoditiesGroww Terminal915 TerminalStocks ScreenerAlgo TradingGroww DigestDemat AccountGroww AMC© 2016-2025 Groww. Invest in a few minutes with the following steps: Log on to your Groww account Search for HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth from the search box In order to invest, you will have to complete all the KYC formalities which are completely online and paperless and take a few minutes to complete Once you are done with that, you can start investing in HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth as SIP or lumpsum as per your investment objective and risk tolerance What kind of returns does HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth provide?The HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth has been there from 01 Jan 2013 and the average annual returns provided by this fund is 7.08% since its inception.How much expense ratio is charged by HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth?The term Expense Ratio used for HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth or any other mutual fund is the annual charges one needs to pay to the Mutual Fund company for managing your investments in that fund. - **Exit Load**: Understand termsExpense ratioA fee payable to a mutual fund house for managing your mutual fund investments. **Q: Tax implication**

If you redeem within one year, returns are taxed at 20%. If you redeem after one year, returns exceeding Rs 1.25 lakh in a financial year are taxed at 12.5%.

content_md:
## FAQ

**Q: How to Invest in HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth?You can easily invest in HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth in a hassle-free manner on Groww. The process is extremely simple, quick and completely paperless. Invest in a few minutes with the following steps: Log on to your Groww account Search for HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth from the search box In order to invest, you will have to complete all the KYC formalities which are completely online and paperless and take a few minutes to complete Once you are done with that, you can start investing in HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth as SIP or lumpsum as per your investment objective and risk tolerance**

What kind of returns does HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth provide?The HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth has been there from 01 Jan 2013 and the average annual returns provided by this fund is 7.08% since its inception.

How to Redeem HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth?If you want to sell your HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth holdings, go to your holding on the app or web and simply click on it. What is the PE and PB ratio of HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth?The PE ratio ratio of HDFC Small Cap Fund Direct Growth is determined by dividing the market price by its earnings per share and the PB ratio of the same is evaluated by dividing the stock price per share by its book value per share (BVPS).

**Tax Information**: TaxA percentage of your capital gains payable to the government upon exiting your mutual fund investments. Taxation is categorized as long-term capital gains (LTCG) and short-term capital gains (STCG) depending on your holding period and the type of fund.
